message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. For a limited time, I'm willing to extend this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the quality and benefits we're confident you'll appreciate.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. However, given the quality and features of the product, I believe $80 might not cover our costs. To accommodate you, I would like to offer the product at $95. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while providing you with a great value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $87.50. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial price. Considering the value provided by our product, I am willing to offer it to you at $90. This price allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still being competitive in the market.

I'm starting to think that I'm not going to find a better deal anywhere else, but I'm still not willing to pay $90. I'll make one more offer: $85. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
